etymology.description: simplified character 𣬉 (zhā, "phonetic component") is a stylized form of 昨(昨) (zuó, "yesterday")
etymology.interpretation: In modern usage, 𣬉 (zhā) is primarily used as a phonetic component in other characters, helping to convey sounds. It is derived from the more complex 昨(昨), simplifying it structurally while keeping its phonetic value.
